text: The Sound of Girls Aloud was a 2006 album by Girls Aloud that featured all of their most popular songs so far. It was their fourth album. == Songs on the album == # Sound of the Underground # Love Machine # Biology # I'll Stand By You # Jump # The Show # See the Day # Wake Me Up # Life Got Cold # Something Kinda Ooooh # Whole Lotta History # Long Hot Summer # Money # I Think We're Alone Now Category:Girls Aloud albums Category:2006 albums
title: The Sound of Girls Aloud
